meta_description.text: EverQuest: MMORPG in which players create their avatars, choose a race, and venture into the medieval fantasy world of Norrath. Rating: 8.1/10 · ‎109 votes

people_also_ask.question: Is EverQuest still playable?
people_also_ask.heading: While dozens of similar games have come and gone over the years, EverQuest still endures as a viable commercial enterprise with new expansions still being released on a regular basis, over twenty years after its initial launch....

knowledge_panel.description: everquest is a 3d fantasy-themed massively multiplayer online role-playing game originally developed by verant interactive and 989 studios for windows pcs. it was released by sony online entertainment in march 1999 in north america, and by ubisoft in europe in april 2000. wikipedia
